items.sentence: Tom was supposed to help me paint the barn yesterday, but he never showed up.
I can\'t tell you what a disappointment it was that Tom didn\'t win the race.
Tom ignored Mary almost all day, but finally talked to her just after dinner.
Tom lied about his age, so Mary thought he was much older than he really was.
Tom plans to go to Boston as soon as he can after his summer vacation begins.
